properties.media:imagetext:
May
Eighteenth,
1 9 2 7.
South San Francisco Land & Improvement Co.,
Merchants
Exchange Blag.,
San Francisco.
Gentlemen:
Attention: Mr. P. J. Shaw, General Manager
In line with its policy
to obtain data to enable it to
secure the best possible location for a municipal air port, the
City
and County of San Francisco would like to locate on your
land a temporary structure for the purpose of securing meteorological
data.
The work will be in charge of men assigned from the United
States Weather Bureau and the period of observation will be from
July 1, 1927, to June 30, 1928.
It is our desire to commence the
construction of the necessary
building and installation of the
necessary instruments immediately.
He would appreciate very much permission from your Company
to locate the meteorological station on Belle Air Island, as per
access to the same.
the no, it would with orst that n no ant that you Bold this
privilege would cease, and
you that we would remove the
structure.
We also desire the privilege of removing the structure
and instruments at the expiration of the observation period.
Thanking you in advance for any courtesies you may extend
to us, I am
Very truly yours,
RIGHT OF WAY AGENT.
JJP: KH
